sentences.sentence: As a prolific crier, especially on video, I always come away astounded by the comments... the resounding support of people I know all that well, and the level of intimacy exchanged among them.
sentences.translation: 作为一名多产的哭泣者，尤其在视频上，我离开时总是对那些评论…熟人的大力支持和他们之间交流的亲密程度感到震惊。

sentences.sentence: The slogan crier saw the dog and frog jump to and fro in the fog.
sentences.translation: 呼口号者看见狗和青蛙在雾中来回跳。

sentences.sentence: He has been designated the crier of this village.
sentences.translation: 他被委任为这个村子的地保。
